description:
About This Course:

You will learn how to practice self-hypnosis and consensual therapeutic hypnosis so you can help yourself, and/or help clients in a professional hypnotherapy practice.

This course will give you a foundation in hypnosis because you will learn how to speak hypnotically, and apply hypnosis safely and ethically.

You will learn how to create your own hypnosis scripts. You will achieve this by learning hypnotic language techniques and principles so you can more-so deepen the hypnotic experience for your clients. As you speak more and more hypnotically, practicing what I teach you, you will quickly elevate your hypnosis range of capabilities and become a much more eloquent hypnotist. You will no longer feel the need to rely on hypnosis scripts. This means feeling much more empowered, confident, and competent as a hypnotist.

You will also be able to open your own hypnotherapy practice and be able to successfully hypnotize clients.

Here's everything included in the course:

  • Four primary white-board style video lectures;
  • Total instructor support with in-class discussions;
  • Final exam to measure your success with the course;
  • Certificate (helps with resume building, credibility, etc.);
  • Hypnotic language mini-course so you can create your own hypnosis resources and never have to rely on other hypnotists' scripts ever again;
  • A positive experience; and,
  • A course book bonus; packed full of valuable content which supports and follows along with the course lectures.
title: How I Hypnotize
